name: A Medieval Scene
description:
This is just a small medieval scene that I create for an exam in my video game school

The target was android but I give to you a pc version (no change except the controls)

Don't try this build on you phone or any device with android, that don't will work !

You if you want to see more about it, you can check my ArtStation profile
